review: Awesome. Waiting to get the second one!
author: JLR

review: I've thoroughly enjoyed the Fire TV Stick....so much that I had to add another!  Besides Prime, it also gets me into other services I use such as Hulu, Netflix and Showtime.  Easy to set up, I had it up and running in less than five minutes.  Phone app on my android also makes it easy to use and voice searches are handy.  Highly recommended.  Hopefully more services to be added in the future to make it even better...HBOGO, MAXGO, CBS, etc. would make it a must have!
author: MartianSccr

review: I am really enjoying it.  It was very easy to set up and use.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Fire stick is above and beyond ChromeCast without a doubt!  So much more available on the Fire Stick.
author: CQ Richardson

review: Its ok. It would be excellent but for a lot of those apps like watchespn and such, u still need a cable provider. I bought the fire stick to avoid a cable provider. If i could have watchespn without a cable provider, 5 stars!

review: This product failed to start a fire. I was very disappointed. :( Now I have nowhere to cook my TV.

review: Fire stick is fast and awesome.  As good or better user interface than Apple TV.  As fast as Apple TV.
